casebody.data:
BRUNSON
v.
N.C. DEPT. OF HUMAN RESOURCES, et al. 403P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Dept. of Human Resources. Jonathan E. Brunson, for Brunson, Jonathan E.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of November 2018 by Plaintiff to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
